com.aspose.cells
Class ListBoxActiveXControl

java.lang.Object
  ActiveXControlBase
      ActiveXControl
          com.aspose.cells.ListBoxActiveXControl

public class ListBoxActiveXControl 
extends ActiveXControl

Represents a ListBox ActiveX control.
